value: *MANUSCRIPT: Authorized Generic Entry prior to Patent Expiry: Reassessing Incentives for Independent Generic Entry
*AUTHOR:     Silvia Appelt, University of Munich, silvia.appelt@lrz.uni-muenchen.de
*** MATCHING of of Patent and SPC data (Patent DB 2007) ***
**i) Keep German SPC Applications for monosubstances
*49 cases (out of 563) some basic spc information (e.g. spcnumber) is missing
*match data using patentnumber (unique identifier in master data)
**(2) Preparation patent.dta (German and EP patents only)
*patentnumber unique identifier whenever spcnumber is missing
*Data matching based on INN (unique identifier in using data set)
*Keep Market Approvals of Monosubstances in Germany
*authorizationnumber unique identifier, but missing in 5444 cases
*****(10) Patent-SPC Data - extract final data for matching with NPI data
*Drop observations where key information is missing
*substances spcnumber unique identifier, but spcnumber missing in 48 cases
